content: Does the Style Guide module pull code from the style guide repo? I had done some work on the repo many moons ago that isn't reflected in the module. Should the two be cooperating?

Does the Style Guide module pull code from the style guide repo?

@docwilmot are you trying to confuse us again? :smiley: In how far is the repo something different or somewhere else? Links might help to understand what you refer to...

https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/styleguide vs https://github.com/backdrop-ops/styleguide

backdrop-contrib/styleguide
The styleguide module demonstrates all common Backdrop elements on a single page. - backdrop-contrib/styleguide
backdrop-ops/styleguide
Backdrop CMS Admin theme style guide. Contribute to backdrop-ops/styleguide development by creating an account on GitHub.
But I suspect my question is unnecessary, since I don't think the two have anything to do with each other really.

@docwilmot So the 'ops' repo is/was for designing the new Seven admin theme for Backdrop, and was likely inspired by (and used code from) the contrib module. The contrib module was ported from D7 and allows anyone with a Backdrop site to see all elements rendered on one page for easier theme comparison & theming.
Regarding keeping them up-to-date, I'd suggest work should go into the contrib module, as I doubt the 'ops' repo is used much anymore...
Any further work on the Seven theme can utilise the Styleguide contrib module anyway.
